title: I Was Simply Better Than the Others

replies.body:
Even if RNG favored you, you technically were. Rank 2 has no cohesive synergies beyond 2-3 champ synergies. Rank 3 is a cheese and weak Yordle Comp.

So it's both.

What are you talking about? The 2nd one has at least:
- guardian
- ninja
- 4x ranger
- glacial
- phantom

While the 3rd one is the biggest counter for the blademaster combo -- he almost eliminated me, was it not for the super luck that I had.

Again; 2-3 Synergy combos, other than Ranger. Ranger is a garbage synergy.

It was only (2) Glacial.
(1) Ninja is nothing.


Yordle doesn't counter much of anything atm, especially Blademaster lol. (The actual counter to blademaster is NOBLE) Your mana still charges when you miss, and Shen's dodge is stronger than Yordle dodge.....

Your friggin Draven had a RFC too.

You literally have a skills based Blade comp yet are trying to claim yordle counters it (He doesn't even have a 2 Star Gnar)
Literally, and I mean LITERALLY, everything you said is false.
not everything, he was correct about the Gnar only being one star :P........ I wonder where he gets the idea that your draven had a RFC though
